temples.name: Columbia South Carolina Temple
temples.address: 2905 Trotter Rd Hopkins SC 29061-9573 United States
temples.services: No clothing rental available, No cafeteria available, No patron housing available, Distribution center nearby
temples.history: The Columbia South Carolina Temple is the 62nd operating temple of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. The temple was announced 11 September 1998 and was dedicated 16 October 1999.
temples.closure-schedule: Wednesday, 23 November 2022, Thursday, 24 November 2022, Saturday, 24 December 2022, Saturday, 31 December 2022

temples.name: Campinas Brazil Temple
temples.address: Rua James Esdras Faust, 400 Barrio Notre Dame CEP 13092-820 Campinas - SP, Brazil
temples.services: Clothing rental available, Cafeteria available, Patron housing available, Distribution center nearby
temples.history: The Campinas Brazil Temple was the fourth temple built in Brazil and the second built in the state of São Paulo, following the São Paulo Brazil Temple (1978). The temple was announced 3 April 1997 and was dedicated 17 May 2002.
temples.closure-schedule: Monday, 19 September 2022 - Monday, 28 November 2022, Saturday, 24 December 2022, Saturday, 31 December 2022

temples.name: Mexico City Temple
temples.address: Avenida 510 #90 Col. San Juan de Aragon 07950 México, Distrito Federal, Mexico
temples.services: Clothing rental available, No cafeteria available, Patron housing available, Distribution center nearby
temples.history: Ever since endowments were first given in Spanish in 1945 in the Mesa Arizona Temple, faithful Mexican Saints looked forward with anticipation to the time when they might be blessed with a temple in their own country. The temple was announced 3 April 1976 and was dedicated 2 December 1983.
temples.closure-schedule: Saturday, 1 October 2022, Saturday, 24 December 2022 - Sunday, 25 December 2022, Saturday, 31 December 2022

temples.name: Washington D.C. Temple
temples.address: 9900 Stoneybrook Dr Kensington MD 20895-3199 United States
temples.services: Clothing rental available, Cafeteria available, Patron housing available, Distribution center nearby
temples.history: During the first week of the temple open house, government officials and diplomats from around the world were taken on special tours through the building. The open house continued for seven weeks and over 750,000 people went through the temple. The temple was announced 15 November 1968 and was dedicated 19 November 1974.
temples.closure-schedule: Currently closed until 14 August 2022 for Renovations
